name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Clear Google Meet Hand Raise Icon

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Change the Google Meet Hand Raise Icon to an Emoji

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sometimes you accidentally raise your hand in a meeting when you meant to emote, it happens to all of us. Save yourself the embarrassment and use this extension to know which button is for asking a question and avoid that awkward blip!
